Class Acl

Access Control for a BigQuery Dataset. BigQuery uses ACLs to manage permissions on datasets. ACLs are not directly supported on tables. A table inherits its ACL from the dataset that contains it. Project roles affect your ability to run jobs or manage the project, while dataset roles affect how you can access or modify the data inside of a project.
